stories.title: Ask HN: Do you wish a site “I wish X existed” existed?

stories.text:
Hi, I just wrote a reply to another comment and wrote something like: "I hope you have an above-average day today"

My question:

If every day from now on is an 'above-average day', would you call this an exponential growth?

Over all speaking, I'm aware that this would not be a 'continous graph'.
stories.title: Ask HN: A noob question about exponential growth
Apple 5G chip problem is likely legal, not technical
How are PET plastic bottles made?
In Defence of Garlic in a Jar: How Food Snobs Almost Ruined My Love of Cooking

stories.text:
Toraisu.com is an online color matching tool that lets you choose colors for different pieces of furniture, curtains, walls, and floors in your room.

It makes it easy to see how different color combinations look together, and can help you decide on a color scheme before you buy new curtains or furniture. Or it can help you find inspiration if you're making a renovation from scratch.
stories.title: Show HN: Room color visualizer (matching colors on the floor, walls, furniture)
Apple's guy in charge of stopping insider trading guilty of insider trading
